description: Write a challenge page for a new WhatTheHack hackathon.

parameters.name: description_of_hack
parameters.description: A high level overview of the hack to create

parameters.name: keywords
parameters.description: The keywords to use to help generate the challenges

parameters.name: suffix_number
parameters.description: The specific challenge/solution number to generate

parameters.name: input
parameters.description: The output of the previous plugin input

parameters.name: overview
parameters.description: The overview page of the hackathon. Includes the list of challenges.
